mapper.insert: insert into rts(rts_num, rts_date, rts_cause, rts_appl_date, rts_appr_check, rts_appr_date, rts_stud, rts_admin) values(#{rts_num},#{rts_date},#{rts_cause},#{rts_appl_date},#{rts_appr_check},#{rts_appr_date},#{rts_stud},#{rts_admin})
mapper.select:
SELECT RTS_DATE ,STUD_NUM ,STUD_NM ,DEPT_NM ,RTS_CAUSE ,RTS_APPL_DATE ,RTS_NUM ,MIN(RTS_APPL_DATE) as MIN_YR FROM RTS,DEPARTMENT,STUDENT WHERE RTS_STUD=STUD_NUM AND STUD_DEPT=DEPT_NUM
AND RTS_APPL_DATE LIKE SUBSTR(#{rts_appl_date},3,2)||'%'
AND RTS_APPR_CHECK = #{rts_appr_check}
GROUP BY RTS_DATE ,STUD_NUM ,STUD_NM ,DEPT_NM ,RTS_CAUSE ,RTS_APPL_DATE ,RTS_NUM
